Title: Knockout+
Description:
Extensions library for http://knockoutjs.com/ including:
-general purpose custom bindings
-custom binding for popular front-end frameworks
-observable extenders
HomeWiki:
Knockout extensions library

Includes:

  • general purpose custom bindings
  • custom observable extenders
  • custom bindings for jQuery UI (drag, drop)
  • custom bindings for Boostrap front-end framework (icon, modal, dateValue)
  • custom bindings for Metro UI CSS 2.0 front-end framework (in progress)
  • and many many more...

More info on Coderise Ventures Blog.
